text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

(After watching the stage the other day,
It's clear. The center of Straylight is still──...)

──Asahi,
I'm thinking of entrusting it to Asahi... what do you think?

Umm...
I think Fuyuko-chan is good as the center.

Hey, Fuyuko-chan!
It's better if the person who wants to do it does it!

...Ah, is that so...?
Is Fuyuko-chan someone who wants to be the center?

...Being the center is everyone's dream
Fuyu, of course, wants to do it too.

But that's exactly why it's important to be entrusted with it
...Don't just casually say you'll give it up.

Asahi-chan, you have the ability to be chosen,
and with that comes the responsibility of being chosen.
So, I don't really understand that──...
...But, well,

I understand.
I'll do it as the center.

...You wanted Asahi to be the center,
you told me that first, right?

...Thanks for that.
Having time to prepare was really helpful.

──Thanks to you?
You gave a good, obedient reply.
...Fuyuko

If you're trying to console me or something, please stop.
That's totally off the mark.
...Just so you know, I'm not giving up or anything.

Asahi being the center doesn't sit right with me,
and I definitely think Fuyu will eventually take over as center.

But──...
It's not cool to keep complaining forever, you know?

──You need to be as cute as possible, and make them want
to talk to you more.
...Because we're idols, after all.
